flatList.content: Can you help me write a Python function to check if a number is prime?
Thanks! Can you add some test cases?

Sure! Here are some test cases:

```python
print(is_prime(2))    # True
print(is_prime(17))   # True
print(is_prime(100))  # False
print(is_prime(1))    # False
print(is_prime(-5))   # False
```
